programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown - The Ultimate Cowboy: Bigger in Texas: Season two of Ultimate Cowboy Showdown kicks off with the arrival of fourteen real-life cowboys to the sprawling Texas ranch where they'll call home until only one remains. As they set up camp in the sweltering heat, they make their introductions and size up the competition. While getting better acquainted, personalities clash, and alliances form. In the first of many challenges, the cowboys work in teams to sort gold-tagged cattle from a mixed herd. When miscommunication affects a team's performance, they have to answer to Trace. After consulting with two expert judges, Trace eliminates the team member who didn't pull their weight. As the eliminated contestant hits the trail, the remaining thirteen breathe a sigh of relief and prepare for the next challenge.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown - Lines in the Sand: The thirteen remaining cowboys face their first immunity challenge that tests their individual skills. The contestants race to score the fastest time in barrel racing and calf roping. While most cowboys impress Trace and the judges, only one will be safe from the next elimination. For the team challenge, the cowboys take on a group of untrained horses that they have to break, saddle, and ride. In the end, it all comes down to strategy, and the team that thinks ahead takes the win. After a few choice words, teammates lock horns, determined to out-cowboy the other. When an unexpected cowboy heads home, the rest of the contestants realize every move they make counts in this competition.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: New York comedian Max Dolcelli uses his cynacism and enigmatic stage presence to riff on Waze, Dollar Store pregnancy tests, and how horrible toys were when he was a kid.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Tommy Ryman grew up with a new-age, folk singing mother and a traditional, Lutheran insurance-agent father. This XY equation evidently equals: acclaimed comedian. Ryman has earned the title of Semifinalist on NBC's Last Comic Standing. Roseanne Barr, a professed fan, raves she has “never seen anything like Tommy before in her whole life, he is one-of-a-kind, fantastic!” Ryman also recently won the title of Best of the Midwest at the prestigious Gilda's Laugh Fest. Ryman's act can be described as absurdist and clever, masked behind a very likable and innocent demeanor, often thought of as awkwardly charming. He is a favorite among audiences at top clubs, corporates, and colleges around the nation.

programme.title: Daniel Eachus
programme.desc: Daniel Eachus talks about weird jobs, strange fears, and how to prank restaurants all through the lens of being the lifelong skinny guy.

programme.title: Danny Johnson
programme.desc: Danny Johnson's hilarious, clean stand-up has entertained audiences in comedy clubs, corporate events, and churches nationwide. Often called a cross between Jerry Seinfeld and Kevin James Danny's show is relatable, engaging, and always hilarious. Danny has starred in numerous TV commercials, Comedy Central's Laugh Riots, Florida's Funniest Comedian semi-finalist, Winner-Carnival Cruise line Comedy Challenge, Finalist in Search for the One Christian Comedy contest, and has had the pleasure of sharing the stage with Chris Rock, Bob Saget, Billy Gardell, Richard Lewis, and a variety of others. Danny has led a dual track career for over a decade achieving success in both corporate America and as a comedian. Blending his unique skill sets led to him publishing his first book, "You Stink and They Know It! A practical guide to nailing your next job interview."

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Cam shares his outlook on relationships and life through the eyes of a 23-year-old in a way that everyone can relate to. Bringing high energy and witty style that appeals to a wide demographic.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Joe Zimmerman grew up in Morgantown, West Virginia, and started his comedy career in North Carolina. While living in the South, his stand-up group the Beards of Comedy landed a record deal with Comedy Central Records.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Hailing from the great city of Cincinnati, Ohio, Josh comes to Dry Bar to bring “new life” to his comedy. Being funny 24/7 can be difficult, but Josh Sneed does it. Watch “Live in the Dessert” by Josh Sneed now!

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.sub-title: Rob Maher: If You Can Make It Here...
programme.desc: Rob Maher proves that he has the most versatile first name in the English language, that your relationship ended because you didn't spend enough money on wrapping paper, and that being an "accident" is worse than being adopted.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Moody was born “Matthew” in Syracuse, NY, into a rambunctious household with six siblings. (They're Irish...somebody had to get a nickname.) He began doing comedy in 1992 and was soon hired by Syracuse's top morning radio show to cover sports and write jokes, his first loves. After six years of working the road, Moody moved to New York City. This millennium has been good to Moody: he's also been featured on Last Comic Standing, Star Search (the 2003 reboot), and America's Got Talent. He's a regular at the best clubs in the land (including the world famous Comedy Cellar) and can be heard on SiriusXM. Moody's material is described as original but universal, and smart without being trite. Couple that with a disarming stage presence & in-the-moment chops, you'll see why he's earned the admiration of his peers for his ability to “go up cold” and turn any setting into a hot room. From corporate outings to pubs, this versatile performer will brighten any event.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Alex Velluto is a stand-up comedian and Diet Coke drinker from Salt Lake City, Utah. He has performed at comedy festivals all over the country including the Boston Comedy Festival, Big Sky Comedy Festival, and the Seattle International Comedy Competition. He was named “Best of Fest” at the Golden Spike Comedy Festival and is the winner of the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival in Ithaca, NY. In 2016, Alex was voted “Best Comedian” by City Weekly Magazine. His debut comedy special “Alex Velluto: Spurious” is currently streaming on Amazon.com.

programme.title: Stomping Grounds
programme.sub-title: Stomping Grounds - "Tin Boat Mafia, Cape Cod
programme.desc: In this inaugural episode, host Ryan McVinney takes viewers to the outer reaches of Cape Cod, Massachusetts to meet a local group of boaters affectionately referred to as the “The Tin Boat Mafia”. This heart-warming family story of aluminum boat owners who share a love for the outdoors and nature is particularly moving during the COVID-19 pandemic. From fishing and surfing to sun bathing and collecting driftwood, this episode chronicles the group's passion for the water and demonstrates why light-weight, easy-to-handle, shallow draft aluminum fishing boats are their vessels of choice for navigating the sandbars of Cape Cod, MA.

programme.title: Tactical Planning
programme.desc: Matt and Froy walk into a moral gray area when they repossess a vehicle by stealing it. Then, Sonia and Matt discover their target van is being used in an investigation of highly toxic material. And, Matt poses as a valet to retrieve a car from an irate diner and his befuddled date.

programme.title: Four Wheel Surprise
programme.desc: First, Lou and Matt confront a big-time player and his bodyguards at a Brazilian restaurant. Then, Sonia and Lyndah head to a yard sale to get a vehicle away from the car's owner and her out-of-control friend. And finally, the whole team hits the beach in an effort to get a truck-load of ATV's away from a gang of knife-wielding beach bums.

programme.title: Breakdowns and Beatdowns
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy head into a bad part of town to find that their target car is owned by bat-equipped gang bangers. Then, a seemingly friendly teacher and an assistant principal nearly come to blows when Froy and Sonia come around to repossess one of their vehicles Then, And finally, after the tow truck breaks down on the side of the road, Lou, Matt, and Froy are left with no options and stuck in the middle of a violent dispute between some gun-wielding neighbors.

programme.title: You Again?
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Lou get the shock a lifetime when they repossess a car from an irate doctor whom they know all too well from an earlier incident. This time he's twice as angry, and he's dead-set against giving up his car again. Then, Sonia, Matt, and Lyndah go undercover as college students to extract an extremely expensive bicycle from an extremely irate athlete. And finally, Lou and Froy head to church to repossess a van from a minister with a terrible problem.

programme.title: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy transform their search for a small dirt bike into a quasi-reality show, getting a group of young smart-asses trapped into their own web. Then, Sonia and Matt head to the business district for a different sort of quarry - a high-end luxury tanning bed owned by a less-than-sympathetic German. And finally, Lou and Matt set up a high stakes sting operation to bust a shady tow-truck driver, but will their best-laid plans go up in smoke?

programme.title: The Dune Buggy
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy tail an upper class debtor to an upscale restaurant where the food is almost as unpalatable as its clientele's attitude. Then, Lyndah and Froy head to a residential district to repossess a van that is busy being loaded up with stolen electronics by a dangerous pair of criminals. And finally, Matt and Froy head to the desert to sneak an extremely rare top-of-the-line dune buggy from a crew of dedicated off-roaders.

programme.title: High and Low Spirits
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia find themselves in the middle of a baffling marital spat involving a man, his wife, and her untrustworthy yoga instructor. Then, Sonia and Lyndah hit the fashion district to repossess a van from a designer who's way ahead of the curve in terms of the fashion world, but way behind on her payments. And finally, Matt and Froy spoil spirits when they head to a carwash to reclaim a vehicle from a group of vicious, scantily-clad sorority girls.

programme.desc: The boys drive across Burma in budget trucks.

programme.title: Top Gear UK
programme.desc: Jeremy, Richard and James venture into Burma's Shan state, an area rife with civil war.

programme.title: Repo Outside the Box
programme.desc: First, Matt and Sonia attempt to repossess a car from a group of cleaver-wielding short-order cooks with a taste for violence. Then, it's trouble in paradise as Matt and Froy take on the task of reclaiming a beach-scene-on-wheels filled with irate models. And finally, Sonia and Matt find themselves outmatched by a well-armed street gang and its charismatic leader.

programme.title: Horse Semen & the Rolls Royce Golf Cart

Then, Lou and Sonia stumble into the middle of a prolonged business dispute between a flower lady and her displeased client. And finally, Sonia and Froy hit the links to reclaim a high-end Rolls Royce golf cart from a snob who thinks he's too good to pay his bills.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Strozzapretti, literally, means “priest choker.” These ricotta dumpling are so good that in the vein of “I'll bet you can't eat just one,” the fabled priest, visiting for dinner, could not limit his intake of these little marvels. Here Lidia shares how it's made: ricotta gnocchi with radicchio trevisano sauce. To complete the meal, a zesty “Italian style” ricotta cheese cake.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Two very sensual dishes. For Chicken Valdostana, Lidia layers chicken breast with prosciutto, tomato, and herbs, sautéed in wine and butter, adds fontina cheese, and bakes until the cheese melts, becomes golden brown. Then, Seared Pork Cutlets and peppers in a fresh marinara served over rigatoni provides an equally appealing choice. Fortunately, we get both in this episode!

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Italians are not big beef eaters. When they do indulge, it is rarely with steak…except in Florence, where Bistecca Fiorentina is a favorite. At 2” thick, grilled over coals, with a very special anchovy, rosemary and salt rub, it is served with braised cannellini beans. Caramelized tomatoes (yes!) over vanilla ice cream for dessert it's a rich and robust dessert after Bistecca!

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Caesar Salad is a staple on the Italian-American table, even though it's origin in Mexican. Lidia's version is the best of both, and shows us why it is probably America's most popular salad. And who doesn't love Lasagna? Lidia's is classic Italian-American Lassgna steeped in her special meat sauce.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Sunday Ragu – the aromas of Ragu simmering starting early Sunday mornings waft through the courtyards of Lidia's home town, and remain firmly in her sensory memories. Paired with Rigatoni, Meatballs, Braciola di Manzo, and Broccoli Rabe with Oil and Garlic, Lidia's recipes carry her (and you) back to Italy.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Lidia cooks her mother Erminia's and daughter and daughter Tanya's favorite“Italian-American” recipes: Bubbly hot, cheese-filled Manicotti and aromatic savory Spinach-Meat Cannelloni, served right from the oven in a sizzling old-style baking dish. On the side, Lidia's Italian “tri-colore” salad: Arugula, Tomato, Mozzarella.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Forget about the tomato sauce in this episode. Milan is the hub of Northern Italian cooking: Classic Veal Milanese, Lidia's Chicken Parmigiana, and a contemporary version of Veal Capricciosa, a bone-in veal chop, breaded and sauteed, and accompanied by two sides: an arugula-tomato-onion salad and a warm potato, caper and onion salad.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: “Eat the beans, they taste great, and they are good for you!” This is food at the heart of the Mediterranean diet. Pasta fagioli is a meal sized main course soup. Sausages are cooked with beans, then sliced and served separately. It yields a first course by taking beans from the soup and adding them to an escarole salad. Dessert is roasted pears and grapes, served with vanilla ice cream.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: How long did it take for the chicken to cross the road? Well, if it was coming to Lidia's hous, even if it stopped for garlic mashed potatoes and spinach, it would still take less than 30 minutes to get to the table. Here Lidia teaches us how to cook three classic chicken scaloppina dishes, each in under 30 minutes and it's no riddle!

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Filet mignon and chocolate – these don't sound like ingredients to top off a list of Italian-American recipes – but in the kitchen of Lidia Bastianich, it's “Tutti a tavola” to cook and savor two of our most sensual foods: Seared Filet Mignon with Italian style chunky braised vegetables, followed by a rich Hazelnut-Chocolate Ice Cream Truffle.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: A popular dish in Lidia's first restaurant in Queens, New York and still a favorite in her home today, Lidia shares her recipe for Veal Rollatini -- slices of veal rolled and baked until the cheeses ooze out of it. Lidia begins the meal with a classic spinach and bacon salad...and finishes it with sweet crunchy almond cookies for dessert.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Taste and flavor are as much about aromas, textures and story as they are about ingredients. Lidia aims to please all of our senses with this Roman meal fit for an emperor, but enjoyable by everyone, including Lidia's grandchildren. First course, or primi, is spaghetti with anchovies and bread crumbs, followed by pot-roasted herb-scented pork loin the final aromatic touch: braised fennel.

programme.title: Natural Liar

programme.title: The Froylan Job

programme.title: Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: First, a mischievous magician gets Ronnie and Carlos to stick together when they interrupt his show to grab his car. Next, Froy and Ronnie have to put hands on a seriously stupid sugar daddy and the recently upgraded debtor's chest when they repo from a stripper who will do anything to keep her car. And finally, Matt and Carlos go head to head against a boxing manager and his fight fixing fighter.

programme.title: Now Serving Mrs. Pizarro
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy discuss what they will do with their severance pay once the company is sold, but have to put discussion on hold while they repo repo a hovercraft golf cart from a snooty golfer. Next, Sonia and Ronnie's easy day at the salon gets disastrous when the should-be debtor serves Sonia with a lawsuit. And finally, Froy and Carlos head out to a worksite to repo the bulldozer that Carlos should have been training for.

programme.title: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: A professional stunt driver slips through Froy and Sonia's grasp, sending them on a violent high speed chase. Matt offends a pretty RO who seeks womanly revenge, and Froy and Carlos go undercover at a lowrider show. And when Sonia announces a dangerous plan to save the company from the lawsuit, the team must decide whether they're willing to risk it all.

programme.title: The Final Finale
programme.desc: On this special one hour series finale of Operation Repo, the team are scrambling to get ready for the huge Yacht repo to secure the sale of the company and the distribution of their severance packages, while still going after every day repos. In this episode, Sonia and Froy find a payment procrastinating pervert in the park, Matt and Ronnie put the brakes on a rich racecar driver, Matt and Carlos get stuck in the middle of sign maker's gluing process, and Ronnie and Carlos try to reason with an irresponsible retro racist. And finally, on their most dangerous repo ...

programme.title: It Ain't No Joke!
programme.desc: In this kick-off to the final season, the cast takes viewers back through the most outrageous, comical, and memorable repos of the series. And, get a sneak peek of the final season of Operation Repo.

programme.title: Lou's Big Gamble
programme.desc: It's a brand new start for the Operation Repo team when Lou bets big on a high-risk opportunity and sets up shop in Las Vegas! But first, Ronnie and Froy must wrangle a wrestling ring from an lucha libre school, and Carlos and Matt have to break up a Botox party when they go after a car owned by a upper class housewife. Then on their first repo in Vegas, a live tiger stands between the team and a truck, and it seems like Vegas is more than they can handle. If they complete their mission, the payout could be enormous, but will they be able to resist the temptations of ...

programme.title: Interview with the Repo Man

programme.title: Heart Attack Panic
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia are caught in a desperate situation when the owner of their target car is struck by a heart attack. Plus, a repo becomes violent under the watchful eye of the finance company. FSC_OperationRepo_S9E11_HD

programme.title: María Mercedes Capítulo 50
programme.desc: Guillermo ya está fuera de peligro, pero pronto se lo llevarán a la cárcel. Meche se pone muy feliz al descubrir que está embarazada.

programme.title: Triunfo del Amor Capítulo 27
programme.desc: María le confiesa a Juan Pablo que pasó la noche con Max y le dice que teme que Victoria no la acepte. Max le pide a Ximena que no se acerque más a él. Linda se mete a la recámara de Osvaldo y Micaela los ve besándose.

programme.title: Triunfo del Amor Capítulo 28
programme.desc: Guillermo le dice a Ximena que odia a Osvaldo porque le robó a la mujer que más ha amado y para vengarse quiso quitarle la novia a su hijo. Juan Pablo le dice a Bernarda que ya tiene una pista sobre su hija. Victoria está decidida a alejar a María de Max.

programme.title: Lo Que La Vida Me Robó Capítulo 7
programme.desc: Dimitrio le confiesa a Graciela que él mató a Bruno y piensa inculpar a José Luis. Graciela le pide a Ignacio que le ayude a alejar a José Luis de su hija.

programme.title: Lo Que La Vida Me Robó Capítulo 8

programme.title: Lo Que La Vida Me Robó Capítulo 9
programme.desc: Alejandro cree que Montserrat está celosa porque lo vio hablando con Esmeralda. José Luis intenta escapar de prisión con ayuda de su amigo Refugio.

programme.title: Lo Que La Vida Me Robó Capítulo 10
programme.desc: Alejandro besa por primera vez a Monserrat, él le pide que sea su novia y ella le da una oportunidad. José Luis se escapa de la cárcel y asesina a su superior para ir por Monserrat.

programme.title: Teresa Capítulo 44
programme.desc: Teresa continúa su venganza contra Aída y la humilla en la tienda de vestidos de novia. Fernando presenta a Luisa como su novia. Tras una noche de copas, Juana y Cutberto pasan la noche juntos. Mariano sigue creyendo que Teresa aún lo ama y la besa.

programme.title: El Manantial Capítulo 75
programme.desc: Alfonsina debe viajar a la Ciudad de México para finiquitar el trato por su departamento y Hugo, que también debe ir, se ofrece a llevarla. Pero no cuentan con Alejandro, quien tiene un plan diferente. ¿Cómo logrará que no se marche?

programme.title: El Manantial Capítulo 76
programme.desc: Bárbara tiene un ataque de celos al enterarse que Alejandro se marchó con Alfonsina, de modo que el médico acude para atenderla y ella le confiesa algo. Alfonsina y Alejandro siguen fuera de San Andrés, pero surge un percance.

programme.title: Juro Que Te Amo Capítulo 29
programme.desc: Lía trata de hacer entrar en razón a Violeta para que no se vaya con Max, pero ella decide irse. Antonia le pide a Violeta que no se vaya, pero Max se va antes de que ella llegue. José María lleva a Coralito a inscribirse en la escuela.

programme.title: Juro Que Te Amo Capítulo 30
programme.desc: Alejandro le informa a Antonia que está embarazada. Violeta y Alejandro le piden a Antonia que contemple abortar, pero ella se niega. Renato le pide a Fausta que le rente un departamento para verse con Cristiana.

programme.title: Juro Que Te Amo Capítulo 31
programme.desc: Justino visita a escondidas a Antonia, pero Alejandro lo descubre. Mariano permite a José María continuar frecuentando a Ivanna. Julio regresa con su familia, pero les deja en claro que es únicamente para cumplir la promesa que le hizo a su padre.

programme.title: El Manantial Capítulo 74
programme.desc: Pilar está muy orgullosa de haber pagado a la gente para lastimar a Alfonsina. Sin embargo, no cuenta con la denuncia que interpondrá en su contra. En tanto, Alejandro ayuda a Malena a buscar a Eloísa, pero encontrará algo más. ¿Qué será?

programme.title: El Manantial Capítulo 75

programme.title: María de Todos Los Ángeles
programme.desc: Albertano le confiesa a Doña Lucha que está dispuesta a casarse con María de todos los Ángeles. María debe decidir si quedarse con Albertano o iniciar una vida a lado de un nuevo amor.

programme.title: Hotel Todo Incluido Capítulo 6
programme.desc: La estancia de un líder sindical, así como la visita de la actriz Martha Julia generan situaciones de rebeldía y amor en el Hotel Todo Incluido.

programme.title: Hotel Todo Incluido Capítulo 7
programme.desc: Cipriano recibe la triste noticia de que su padre ha muerto. El jefe les pide a todos los empleados del hotel que organicen el funeral para el padre de Cipriano.

programme.title: Hotel Todo Incluido Capítulo 8
programme.desc: Jackie comienza a vender zapatos por catálogo a sus compañeros y a los huéspedes. La actriz Lucía Méndez llega a hospedarse al Hotel Todo Incluido y también a dar una conferencia de prensa.

programme.title: Hotel Todo Incluido Capítulo 9
programme.desc: Los empleados del hotel confunden a la mamá del dueño con otra mujer. Don Chava se enamora de la mamá del patrón y trata de conquistarla pero ella lo desprecia.

programme.title: Hotel Todo Incluido Capítulo 10
programme.desc: Vitor le organiza una fiesta de quince años a su mamá porque nunca pudo celebrarlos y le pide a sus amigos del hotel que lo apoyen en ser padrinos de su madre.

programme.title: Hotel Todo Incluido Capítulo 11
programme.desc: Don Cipriano le cuenta a los empleados que Ninel Conde celebrará su baby shower en el hotel. Cipriano se entera que el Hotel Todo Incluido tiene una denuncia porque no cuenta con las medidas de seguridad necesarias.

programme.title: Hotel Todo Incluido Capítulo 12
programme.desc: Vitor y el resto de empleados del Hotel Todo Incluido confunden a dos huéspedes con la famosa banda de asaltantes conocida como “La Banda del Disfraz”. Sin embargo, un poco tarde descubren que sólo son un par de actores de teatro que están ensayando.

programme.title: Hotel Todo Incluido Capítulo 13
programme.desc: Cipriano elige a Vitor como el empleado del mes y como premio, recibe una noche en la suite presidencial del Hotel Todo Incluido. Durante su estancia, Vitor es atacado zombies pero Chava lo rescata.

programme.title: María de Todos Los Ángeles
programme.desc: Doña Lucha trata de salvar al Chino de malas influencias al enterarse de que asistirá a una fiesta de tribus urbanas. María decide remodelar el cuarto de Albertano creyendo que por fin vivirán juntos.

programme.title: María de Todos Los Ángeles
programme.desc: Doña Lucha aprovecha el corte de agua en la colonia para vender unas cubetas que tenía apartadas. María se pone celosa de la nueva ayudante del equipo de futbol, Citlali, mientras que Albertano se la pasa en la banca por ser mal jugador.

programme.title: María de Todos Los Ángeles
programme.desc: María trata de recuperar el amor de Albertano y hace el ridículo durante su fiesta de cumpleaños. Doña Lucha le da una lección a Rosa Aurora para hacer que se aleje de una mala amistad.

programme.title: María de Todos Los Ángeles
programme.desc: Albertano le pide a María que se den un tiempo y ella decide recuperar a sus ángeles para que la ayuden a superar su rompimiento. Doña Lucha cree que ya es tiempo de que platique con el Chino sobre temas de adultos.

programme.title: María de Todos Los Ángeles
programme.desc: Doña Lucha tiene la idea de hacer un calendario con las abuelitas de la vecindad para ganar dinero. María se somete a una reparación estética para reconquistar a Albertano.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Roberta agrede a Vico por inventar que es novia de Teo. León le pide a Diego que convenza a su madre para que no se separe de él. Lupita descubre que Joaquín sale con Mia y Roberta. Teo le confiesa a Roberta que es un asesino.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Mabel le pide a Diego que se quede a vivir con su papá. Roberta se prepara para su primera vez con Joaquín, pero Alma lo impide. Diego le dice a Roberta que Joaquín la engaña con Mía.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Roberta le demuestra a Mía que Joaquín anda con las dos y para vengarse de él le provoca un accidente. Teo les pide a sus padres que le digan si su hermano estaba drogado cuando se accidentó. Karen invita a todos al nuevo café de Nico.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Lupita descubre que Nico todavía es novio de Karen. Roberta le platica a Alma sobre el engaño de Joaquín. Miguel propone que Diego y Mía canten para pagar la cuenta. Franco encuentra a Mía cantando y la castiga. Joaquín llega en muletas al colegio.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Vico le reclama a Celina por decirle a sus hermanos que Miguel pasó la noche en su casa. Vico y Miguel se hacen novios. Mabel le confiesa a Diego que tiene que sacarlo del colegio. La mamá de Nico se enoja al saber que a Nico le gusta Lupita.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Mía y Roberta corren el rumor que Joaquín es homosexual. Celosa porque Vico va a salir con Miguel, Celina la golpea. Nico decide terminar con Lupita para ayudar a su familia. Pilar ayuda a Joaquín a limpiar su imagen, pero Mía y Roberta arruinan todo.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Alma defiende a Mía ante Franco. Roberta y Jose empiezan a investigar sobre el hermano de Teo. Mendiola amenaza a Pascual con despedirlo si no pone en orden en el colegio. Tomás se preocupa porque Diego quiere auto secuestrarse.

programme.title: Cuidado con el Ángel Capítulo 19
programme.desc: Marichuy descubre que Amador no está ciego. Estefanía enfrenta a Juan Miguel para saber si está enamorado de Marichuy. Isabella lleva a cabo sus planes para hacer que Marichuy arruine la fiesta de Estefanía.

programme.title: Cuidado con el Ángel Capítulo 20
programme.desc: Marichuy se encela la ver a Estefanía besar a Juan Miguel. Viviana descubre que su amante es un ladrón. Estefanía lleva a cabo sus planes para enamorar a Juan Miguel.

programme.title: Cuidado con el Ángel Capítulo 21
programme.desc: Marichuy sufre al saber que Juan Miguel ha decidido casarse con Estefanía. Estefanía lleva a cabo sus planes para deshacerse de Marichuy. Juan Miguel sospecha que Marichuy está enamorada de Amador.

programme.title: Cuidado con el Ángel Capítulo 22
programme.desc: Marichuy le asegura a Cecilia que un hombre quiere abusar de ella. Eduardo lleva a cabo sus planes para casarse con Elsa cuanto antes. Isabella le hace creer a Patricio que Marichuy es una ladrona.

programme.title: Sortilegio Capítulo 33
programme.desc: María José comienza a buscar trabajo. Hernán le confiesa a Victoria que la quiere. Elena le cuenta a Ulises la verdad sobre sus hijas gemelas, María José y Sandra. Maura besa a Alex.

programme.title: Sortilegio Capítulo 34
programme.desc: Fernando y Victoria se besan. María José descubre que Alex envió a Chucho al pueblo donde vive para espiarla. María José es herida cuando unos hombres entran a robar a la tienda donde trabaja.

programme.title: Sortilegio Capítulo 35
programme.desc: María José teme que Alex dude que el bebé que espera sea de él. Pedro se entera que María José está embarazada. María José corre peligro después de haber perdido sangre. Alex le pide perdón a María José. Bruno se entera que María José está embarazada.

programme.title: Sortilegio Capítulo 36
programme.desc: Raquel le pide a Bruno que no ayude a María José a recuperarse. Bruno le dice a Alex que ayudará a María José si le cede la presidencia y se divorcia de ella y él acepta sin remedio. María José se entera que Bruno fue quien le donó sangre.

programme.title: Los Juniors
programme.desc: Tres amigos ingresan voluntariamente a un monasterio, dentro del cual se realiza un reportaje. El abad habla con ellos para brindarles confianza y ellos le cuentan las oscuras razones por las que se ordenaron en el monasterio.

programme.title: Las Golfas
programme.desc: Diana es una trabajadora sexual que es despedida del cabaret donde trabaja, conoce a Luis quien entra en el negocio de las drogas. Emiliano es el líder del negocio de las drogas y también trata de conquistar a Diana.

programme.title: Los albañiles
programme.desc: Don Jesús es el velador de una construcción. Una noche es asesinado por alguien desconocido, pero que se presume labora en la misma construcción. El resto de los trabajadores es interrogado por la policía.

programme.title: Las Golfas
programme.desc: Diana es una trabajadora sexual que es despedida del cabaret donde trabaja, conoce a Luis quien entra en el negocio de las drogas. Emiliano es el líder del negocio de las drogas y también trata de conquistar a Diana.

programme.title: Salón México
programme.desc: Mercedes trabaja como bailarina en un cabaret para poder pagar la exclusiva escuela para señoritas a la que asiste su hermana Beatriz. Pero cuando Paco, su explotador, le roba una gran cantidad de dinero, Mercedes decide no aguantar ni un maltrato más.

programme.title: Los olvidados
programme.desc: Un grupo de delincuentes juveniles vive una vida violenta y llena de crímenes en los barrios marginales de la ciudad de México, y la moral del joven Pedro es gradualmente corrompida y destruida por los demás.

programme.title: Ladronzuela
programme.desc: Una ladrona huérfana vive en la calle con tres niños que cantan en los camiones. Un día decide defenderlos ante una injusticia y por ello termina en la cárcel. Ahora salir de ella será todo un reto.

programme.title: Los olvidados
programme.desc: Un grupo de delincuentes juveniles vive una vida violenta y llena de crímenes en los barrios marginales de la ciudad de México, y la moral del joven Pedro es gradualmente corrompida y destruida por los demás.

programme.title: Ladronzuela
programme.desc: Una ladrona huérfana vive en la calle con tres niños que cantan en los camiones. Un día decide defenderlos ante una injusticia y por ello termina en la cárcel. Ahora salir de ella será todo un reto.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'La salud no tiene precio y el que la arriesga es un necio'
programme.desc: Una madre primeriza decide hacerle caso a su amiga y no vacunar a su hijo, pues cree que puede ser contraproducente para el bebé, sin saber que su decisión pondrá en riesgo la salud del pequeño.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'No hay peor sordo que el que no quiere oir'
programme.desc: Para sentirse amada, una joven trata de ganarse el corazón de un chico haciendo siempre lo que él le pide, llevándola a los excesos y sin hacer caso de advertencias. Los padres de la joven se darán cuenta muy tarde del error en el que estaba su hija.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.desc: Un joven sale de prisión y trata de ayudar a su hermano a ser una buena persona, pero sus planes no saldrán como esperaba y ambos aprenderán una gran lección.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'Mala y engañosa ciencia es juzgar por las apariencias'
programme.desc: Una joven cegada por su ambición y traumas del pasado, comienza a conquistar hombres adinerados para drogarlos y robarles.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'No hay más cera que la que arde'
programme.desc: Dos jóvenes se enfrentan con grandes obstáculos que superar, uno se ha quedado huérfano y tiene que irse a vivir con sus padrinos, y el otro, despierta de un coma después de 10 años.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'Humano es el errar y divino el perdonar'
programme.desc: Durante una sesión fotográfica en la calle una chica sufre un accidente que la deja parapléjica. La madre de la joven culpa a su hijo por el accidente y está dispuesta a hacer lo que sea para que su hija vuelva a caminar.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'Quien de tu mal no te advierte, mal te quiere'
programme.desc: Un joven sueña con ser DJ, pero debe lidiar con la extrema disciplina de su abuelo, quien quedó a cargo de él después de la muerte de sus padres. El joven y su abuelo tendrán que aprender a convivir respetando sus diferencias.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'A amor mal correspondido, ausencia y olvido'
programme.desc: Una joven tiene una relación con un hombre casado a pesar de que su padre y su amiga se oponen. Poco a poco la joven se va dando cuenta de las falsas promesas de su amante y comienza a aprender que no debe depender de nadie.

programme.title: Pequeños Gigantes 2 Programa 12

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Blueberry is disappointed in the girls' lack of enthusiasm for the Patti Persimmon mystery novels, her favorite book series. She finds herself missing the company of her fellow Persimmon fan Huckleberry, and thinks up a great way to get him to visit. She invites Huck to co-write a story with her to submit to an online mystery magazine.. Huck eagerly accepts and comes for a visit.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When Huckleberry and Blueberry's Patti Persimmon-style mystery story is rejected by an online mystery magazine, Blueberry and Huck have to come up with a new way to raise support for Huckleberry's Hotel for Homeless Pets back in Berry Big City. Strawberry suggests they hold a big dog show! Plum makes over-ambitious plans to display talents that her dog does not quite have, trying to teach him complicated dance routines.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The Baby Berrykins are enthralled by a fairytale that Blueberry reads to them for Story Time. Charmed by their reaction, Strawberry suggests that the girls do a "berrytale play" for the kids, sort of a "Story Time On Stage." Plum volunteers to direct it. She envisions a small, simple production-until she hears about a gigantic production of "Snowberry and the Seven Berrykins" that's a smash hit in Berry Big City.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry and the girls excitedly plan to put on a "Story Time On Stage" musical play for the Berrykin kids: "Berryella and Prince Berry Charming," directed and choreographed by Plum, with musical direction by Cherry. Strawberry will play Berryella, with Lemon and Blueberry as her comically jealous stepsisters, and costume designer Raspberry as her Fairy Fashionmother.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Blueberry and Huck turn the Baby Berrykins' favorite fairy tale, "The Littlest Berrykin," into a comedy play. They pitch it to director Plum and the assembled cast and crew using a large storybook. As Huck and Blueberry narrate the story, we push in on the book and its illustrations transition into animation. In the story, the King and Queen of the Berry Patch (played by Huck and Blueberry) are retiring to the tropics.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Orange wants to spend the day teaching her puppy to fetch, but the frisky little gal doesn't seem to understand the "retrieve" part of the activity-as soon as she gets the ball, she runs out of sight and returns moments later without it. Orange gets a new ball and tries again, with the same results. Over and over, until Orange is out of balls. Puzzled and frustrated that she can't find where her pup has stashed them, she goes to enlist her friends to help her search.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Cherry Jam is being driven to distraction! She can't finish a song that she promised to write for a singing group, thanks to the earsplitting noise from Berrykin construction crews who are trying to find the sparkleberry juice blockage that has shut down the town's power. Strawberry can't cook in the café, Lemon's hair salon appliances are running out of control-life in Berry Bitty City is impossible!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: With the power completely out in Berry Bitty City, the girls go on a camping trip to be out of the way of the Berrykin work crews. Lemon is nervous because she believes there is a creepy creature in the forest (that she read about in a book Blueberry loaned her), and the girls get the nervous bug, but Strawberry turns their apprehension into fun by daring her friends to stay out in the woods the longest!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The girls are driven to distraction by their frisky puppies frolicking all over Berry Bitty City! Full of energy and thinking that everything in town is a toy for them to play with, they cause comical mayhem wherever they go. Strawberry suggests the pups need a place of their own where they can play, a dog park! The girls decide to call in Huckleberry, who runs an animal hotel in Berry Big City, to help design the park.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The girls plan a formal afternoon lawn party tea to inaugurate their new dog park. Plum is in charge of decorations, Cherry music, and Strawberry snacks. There's even a giant, dog-shaped ice sculpture. As the girls get dressed, Raspberry puts the finishing touches on the high-fashion hats that will accompany their beautiful gowns. At last everything is ready. But when the gate opens... the puppies back away!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: To convince the dance-averse Huckleberry to attend the big masquerade ball at the dog park, Blueberry promises she'll stay by his side the whole evening and make sure he doesn't have to dance. But as the day of the ball dawns, Blueberry awakens with a bad cold. She doesn't know how to tell Huck that she can't go to the ball. Lemon and Raspberry misinterpret her sniffles, thinking she's so heartbroken to be disappointing Huck that she's crying!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Berry Bitty City is abuzz as Berrykin Bloom introduces the biggest, juiciest, strangest fruit anyone has ever seen! It's the size of a house, shaped like a strawberry, colored like a watermelon and has a spiky pineapple top. "I call it the sparklestrawwaterpineberry!" says Berrykin Bloom. Princess Berrykin declares it the greatest achievement in Berryculture she's ever witnessed.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Lemon and Raspberry hire twins Sweet & Sour to help out in Strawberry's café, so Strawberry will have time to appear in an internet fashion contest.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry's world-traveling cousin Apple Dumplin' stops at Berry Bitty City. What starts as a brief visit becomes a series of comical misadventures that ends with Apple finding a new home with Strawberry and her friends.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Lemon and Raspberry's fashion podcast is saved by Apple, then almost sabotaged by Sweet and Sour when Lemon's "mood hair" runs amok, acting like the bickering twins, and the twins' comical argument is accidentally broadcast on the "berrynet."
